Class Summary

Global

KeywordSynchronizer used to check if it is okay to proceed with a synchronization task

Storage.DatabaseHelper  
SubmitIncompleteSearches This code runs on a background timer thread during synchronization
SubmitLocalSearchUsage Looks for any usage logs pending for submission and attempts to submit them.
SynchronizeTask synchronizes local data including: updating keywords, submitting usage logs, submitting incomplete searches, and retrieving search results
